code: import React from'react';import aboutImage from'../../assets/image/about-photo.jpg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const About=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"about",id:"about",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main-container main-container--about",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"about__image",src:aboutImage,alt:"band photo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about__content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"About Us"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Run With Knives is a band of distinct and (un)talented individuals brought together by frontman Marlin.
